website_summaries.verdict: This medium-size chime set has a gorgeous tone and is extremely portable. It's relatively small, though, so it's best for class use and small musical ensembles.
pros: Chimes are aluminum-titanium alloy and measure 3/8-inch thick
Braided CordLoc suspends chimes from mantle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mark tree set. Has beautiful sound and love that it's made in USA. Good sturdy base and all around great quality. Mine even had a tag signed by the gal who made it.
customer_reviews.author: VLD13

customer_reviews.title: Can be used as a musical instrament, not just a wind chime.
customer_reviews.text: Virtually flawless construction and its in tune. I have two issues thou... I tried quite a few items as striking instruments before I found what worked for me, including bell mallets and the side of a box end wrench. Whatever you use, it must be very hard to get a good clean sound. For my self, I hot glued a standard size glass marble to the end of a wooden dowel and I have found nothing to work better since. My other issue is that its not very loud. Being a music hobbyist, I could rig a couple vocal condenser microphones to a mixer then to an amplifier and that solved that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joeblade

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I teach elementary music, and I needed two sets of chimes. I purchased one that had a wooden base and stand, but they only had one left. So, I needed another, and I was hesitant to purchase this one, because I thought it would be more likely to tip over than the wooden one. Now that I have received both, I think I prefer this one. Both have a beautiful sound and they sound wonderful together. However, I think this one is actually less likely to get tipped over by over-zealous hands. I highly recommend this quality instrument.
customer_reviews.author: K. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Arrive Today Sounds Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It arrived today. Will use it in my meditation class and music making. Sound beautiful. Comes with a personal touch, naming the person who made it. Thank you Tristan!!! ;)
customer_reviews.author: L. L. S

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive the chime. I use it in my classroom. The kids love it. It arrived in perfect shape Thank you !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality bar chime and the tabletop stand makes it easy to use. I sing and play percussion in a small chorus and use a nice tray table for this and my other instruments. It does not have as many chimes as others I've used, but is perfect for my needs. It added a lot to our chorus's recent Christmas program, and I look forward to using it for many more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase and price.
customer_reviews.text: These chimes work very well as I use them as a percussion accent with the Woodstock Energies Trio Chime. Tones are fabulous on both! TreeWorks chimes are easy to set up but they tend to stick when dissembling - simple cure is soap in the holes. Would recommend purchasing. With a band the chimes definitely need to be miked to be heard well...
customer_reviews.author: Steve N.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment! Plus
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bar chimes to use with my senior citizens' musical group. The chimes are well made and sound fabulous. Great investment! Plus, the seniors like them so much, they fight over who gets to play them! Well done, TreeWorks!
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Sounds wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This Medium Table Top Chime with Stand was what I was looking for. It is the size needed and sounds wonderful. It could benefit from a pair of rubber "shoes" to prevent it from sliding. I wrapped a rubber band on each side where the metal touches the table and that controls the slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nuria from Guate

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I use this in a recording studio. Great sound. Solid. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound, loud but not jarring. I'm a teacher and use it in my classroom as a signal for students. They love it too, and said it sounds "like magic".
customer_reviews.author: A Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Free-standing chimes sound great
customer_reviews.text: I chose this set of chimes because I needed it to be free-standing (most of the others I saw needed to be mounted on a drum kit, etc.). I had thought I might need to get a used set, because I didn't want to spend a lot of money, but the TreeWorks version was reasonably priced. I was impressed with the craftsmanship, and the tones are lovely. My daughter says it sounds like we have a fairy in the house :)
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Maynard Smith

customer_reviews.title: The Chimes Ring Out
customer_reviews.text: The chimes were very well packaged, the best ever. Very good quality crafted and in the USA. The sound is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Cherezee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful and beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and beautiful sound!!!! So worth the money!!! I am not one that usually writes reviews, but this was worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chimes
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely Love the Chimes! They are Exactly as pictured..the top part with the chimes will come off for easy transport and they have an Amazing Sound...I will be using them with my gong for sound healing...I am Very Happy with this Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: danclarkmd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound, practical to store between uses, nice looking, and best of all, a lovely sound.
customer_reviews.author: KD-D

customer_reviews.title: Music to the ears and pocket book!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality and sound of this product. It's music to the ears and pocket book. Well done, TreeWorks!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Waite

customer_reviews.title: Great product for not much money!
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than anticipated. Sound is great! Very good affordable chimes. Not disappointed at all!! Not cheap looking or sounding.
customer_reviews.author: Sickpuppy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Even though I did not pay for overnight shipping, my chimes arrived in less than 2 days! They were very well packed and just as beautiful as pictured. The sound is excellent! I am very pleased with this purchase for my son's birthday
customer_reviews.author: Nutfieldmom

customer_reviews.title: It is very cool
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I play it in our bhajan group. The only small minus is, that the base cannot be folded when I travel, it fits my backpack still surprisingly well. I bought this, because the other models require different stand, which doesn't look so cool. The sound is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Vähä-herttua

customer_reviews.title: Chimes
customer_reviews.text: These chimes are just what I needed for the handbell choir that I conduct! They don't take up a lot of space and are table-top.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: It does have a nice sound for a small one
customer_reviews.text: Go for a bigger one if you are a musician. It does have a nice sound for a small one.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Hand Crafted Chimes add magic to our music!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous chimes arrived in perfect condition. The stand is so convenient. When I am playing other instruments, I can easily access the chimes with hand or foot to incorporate their magical sound into my music. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne C. Page

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it fit perfectly on my percussion table, I don’t need to bring an extra stand or clamp
customer_reviews.author: edgar pablo

customer_reviews.title: Would be fantastic if a striker was included
customer_reviews.text: Absolute quality materials and craftsmanship. Sound is as heavenly as you can get here on earth. Would be fantastic if a striker was included.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Burklow

customer_reviews.title: Attention-getter with a beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my wife to use in her 3rd grade classroom. She uses it to get their attention and the children love the beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument
customer_reviews.text: Great piece to add to your musical instruments. The stand is sturdy and is great in small places. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great chime!
customer_reviews.text: These chimes are of great quality and the stand is durable for our school age child. It makes a wonderful sound. Definitely recommend to anyone who loves chimes.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Staite

customer_reviews.title: Great Producat at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived quickly and is exactly what we needed. The product is well made and has a beautiful look and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These chimes sound beautiful and really give off a magical sound when played
customer_reviews.text: These chimes sound beautiful and really give off a magical sound when played. My students love using this in music class!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Gangs of New York
customer_reviews.text: This dvd does a fantastic job of depicting what was going on in New York City during the ending years of the Civil War. The filming was marvelous. I received the dvd as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K. Buchly

customer_reviews.title: The perfect price for the product
customer_reviews.text: The TreWorks TRE421 chimes was the perfect purchase for the sound, price, and usability. The chimes are well made, and the stand is extremely durable. I would recommend this stand for anyone who does not want to spend too much money on a wind chime set.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

product_meta.title: TreeWorks Chimes Medium Top Bar Chime — MADE IN U.S.A. — For Percussion Tables, Desks, Classroom Music, Meditation or Yoga, Includes Powder Coated Metal Stand (TRE421)
product_meta.description: At TreeWorks Chimes, we specialize in crafting exceptional, high-quality American made percussion instruments from our small shop in Nashville, TN using locally sourced materials. Our specialty started with handcrafting chimes (sometimes called bar chimes, wind chimes or chime trees). These instruments are incredibly well made and produce lush, beautiful waves of tone with a sweep of your hand. They are simple to play. Use your finger to drag along the face of the chime bars just below the hole where the strings are mounted, and let one chime gently drop into the next. TreeWorks does not recommend using a beater or striker, due to the contact sound it creates. The magic comes from the chime bars themselves making contact. The metal 3/8” diameter chime bars are made of TreeWorks' exclusive Aluminum/Titanium alloy, comprised of 11 different metals melted together. They are heat treated for 8 hours to create a crystal clear tone, then the bars are polished to a brilliant finish. The unique chromatic-like tuning has been described as ethereal and shimmering—great for any music or sound immersion setting. The mantle, TreeWorks' name for the wooden frame, is crafted from solid Tennessee hardwood. The deep color is brought out with a hand-rubbed oil finish that is high-end, yet understated. Each chime bar is individually hand-tied to the mantle. One-bar-at-a-time. NO PLASTIC TIES and NO STAPLES are used. The braided CordLoc(TM) we use can hold up to 50 pounds (think miniature rappelling rope). To say TreeWorks chimes are durable is an understatement. This chime is great for using on your desk, a percussion table or for meditation and yoga. The stand makes for quick set up and takes up practically no space—no assembly is required. Its ¼” diameter metal frame is hand-bent in our shop and will keep the chimes from tipping over. With a simple sweep of your hand a wondrous tone is released. It is a calming way to begin meditation. The perfect signal for a teacher to begin class. That extra something you add to the end of the song. There are many uses for this beautiful instrument. No musical training needed. Made in Nashville, Tennessee, U. S. A.
feature_bullets: PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA | Each TreeWorks Chimes product is made from Tennessee hardwood and locally sourced aluminum/titanium and is assembled in our workshop just north of Nashville, TN.
DIMENSIONS | The TRE421 is 19 x 12 x 10 inches in diameter when placed on its metal stand.

THE PERFECT CHIME FOR THE OFFICE OR CLASSROOM | With its sturdy, matte black powder coated metal stand, mounting this medium bar chime is a piece of cake. The table top stand is designed to stabilize the chimes as they are played and can easily be placed on any flat surface. From your office desk to a trap table set up for a percussion ensemble, the possibilities are endless.

HAND-CRAFTED FOR SUPERIOR DURABILITY | Long-lasting braided CordLoc is used to susped our 3/8" thick Aluminum/Titatnium alloy bars on a hand-finished Tennessee hardwood mantle. Our unrivaled table top stand is made from durable steel and is designed to withstand the test of time. Unlike other brands, we always source our materials locally and reject the use of plastic ties to secure our bars to our mantles.
